title: Setting up the Matrix
text: First, set up the matrix for this equation. The variables here are the accounts.

title: Gaussian Elimination
text: Now that you have the matrix $$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 1 & 10000 \\ 0.03 & 0.025 & 283.50 \end{bmatrix}$$, solve the system using Gaussian elimination.

title: Finding $$y$$
text: To eliminate $$x$$ from the second equation, we can multiply the first row by $$-0.03$$ and add it to the second row. What do we get for $$y$$?

title: Finding $$x$$
text: Now, substitute the value of $$y$$ into the first equation to solve for $$x$$.
